types.name: amazonqConversationId
types.description: Uniquely identifies a message with which the user interacts.

types.name: amazonqGenerateApproachIteration
types.description: Order of approach iteration. For initial code changes it is 0

types.name: amazonGenerateApproachLatency
types.description: The time it takes to generate approach response

types.name: amazonqGenerateCodeIteration
types.description: Order of code generation iteration. For initial code changes it is 0

types.name: amazonqGenerateCodeResponseLatency
types.description: The time it takes to generate code generation response

types.name: amazonqCodeGenerationResult
types.description: Captures if code generation result is Complete, Failed,etc

types.name: amazonqNumberOfFilesGenerated
types.description: Captures the number of files generated as a part of code generation iteration

types.name: amazonqRepositorySize
types.description: Captures  size of the source code

types.name: ec2ConnectionType
types.description: Ec2 Connection Methods

types.name: documentFormat
types.description: SSM Create document format selection

types.name: ssmOperation
types.description: SSM Publish Document operation type

types.name: starterTemplate
types.description: Starter template chosen during create document

types.name: command
types.description: The id of a VS Code command

types.name: debounceCount
types.description: Number of times the telemetry event was debounced before emission

types.name: cli
types.description: Installed CLI

types.name: findingId
types.description: The id of a security finding from a code scan

types.name: detectorId
types.description: The id of the detector which produced the code scan issue

types.name: cwsprChatTriggerInteraction
types.description: Identifies the specific interaction that opens the chat panel

types.name: cwsprChatConversationId
types.description: Unique identifier for each conversation

types.name: cwsprChatUserIntent
types.description: Explict user intent associated with a chat message

types.name: cwsprChatHasCodeSnippet
types.description: true if user has selected code snippet, false otherwise.

types.name: cwsprChatProgrammingLanguage
types.description: Programming language associated with the message

types.name: cwsprChatConversationType
types.description: Identifies the type of conversation

types.name: cwsprChatMessageId
types.description: Unique identifier for each message in an conversation

types.name: cwsprChatActiveEditorTotalCharacters
types.description: Total number of characters in the active editor

types.name: cwsprChatActiveEditorImportCount
types.description: Number of import statements in the active editor

types.name: cwsprChatResponseCodeSnippetCount
types.description: Number of code snippets in response

types.name: cwsprChatResponseCode
types.description: HTTP response code for message API invocation

types.name: cwsprChatSourceLinkCount
types.description: Number of links in response

types.name: cwsprChatReferencesCount
types.description: Number of references in response

types.name: cwsprChatFollowUpCount
types.description: Number of follow ups in response

types.name: cwsprChatTimeToFirstChunk
types.description: Time taken in ms to get back the first chunk

types.name: cwsprChatFullResponseLatency
types.description: Time taken to get the full response in ms

types.name: cwsprChatResponseLength
types.description: Number of characters in response

types.name: cwsprChatRequestLength
types.description: Number of characters in request

types.name: cwsprChatInteractionType
types.description: Indicates the specific interaction type with a message in a conversation

types.name: cwsprChatInteractionTarget
types.description: Identifies the entity within the message that user interacts with.

types.name: cwsprChatAcceptedCharactersLength
types.description: Count of code characters copied to the editor

types.name: cwsprChatHasReference
types.description: True if the code snippet that user interacts with has a reference.

types.name: cwsprChatModificationPercentage
types.description: % of characters edited by user after copying/inserting code from a message

metrics.name: vscode_executeCommand
metrics.description: Emitted whenever a registered Toolkit command is executed

metrics.name: aws_autoUpdateBeta
metrics.description: Emitted whenever the Toolkit checks, and potentially installs, a beta version

metrics.name: aws_installCli
metrics.description: Called after attempting to install a local copy of a missing CLI

metrics.name: ssm_createDocument
metrics.description: An SSM Document is created locally

metrics.name: ssm_deleteDocument
metrics.description: An SSM Document is deleted

metrics.name: ssm_executeDocument
metrics.description: An SSM Document is deleted

metrics.name: ssm_openDocument
metrics.description: An SSM Document is opened locally

metrics.name: ssm_publishDocument
metrics.description: SSM Document related metrics for create and update

metrics.name: ssm_updateDocumentVersion
metrics.description: SSM Document related metrics for updating document default version

metrics.name: vscode_activeRegions
metrics.description: Record the number of active regions at startup and when regions are added/removed

metrics.name: aws_showExplorerErrorDetails
metrics.description: Called when getting more details about errors thrown by the explorer

metrics.name: aws_showRegion
metrics.description: Records a call to add a region to the explorer

metrics.name: aws_hideRegion
metrics.description: Records a call to remove a region from the explorer

metrics.name: sam_detect
metrics.description: Called when detecting the location of the SAM CLI

metrics.name: cdk_explorerDisabled
metrics.description: Called when expanding the CDK explorer is disabled

metrics.name: cdk_explorerEnabled
metrics.description: Called when the CDK explorer is enabled

metrics.name: cdk_appExpanded
metrics.description: Called when the CDK explorer is expanded

metrics.name: cdk_provideFeedback
metrics.description: Called when providing feedback for CDK

metrics.name: cdk_help
metrics.description: Called when clicking on help for CDK

metrics.name: cdk_refreshExplorer
metrics.description: Called when refreshing the CDK explorer

metrics.name: redshift_executeQuery
metrics.description: Called when redshift query is executed

metrics.name: redshift_listDatabases
metrics.description: Called when redshift listDatabases API is called

metrics.name: redshift_listSchemas
metrics.description: Called when redshift listSchemas API is called

metrics.name: redshift_listTables
metrics.description: Called when redshift listTables API is called

metrics.name: sam_attachDebugger
metrics.description: Called after trying to attach a debugger to a local sam invoke

metrics.name: sam_openConfigUi
metrics.description: Called after opening the SAM Config UI

metrics.name: codewhisperer_codeScanIssueHover
metrics.description: Called when a code scan issue is hovered over

metrics.name: codewhisperer_codeScanIssueApplyFix
metrics.description: Called when a code scan issue suggested fix is applied

metrics.name: codewhispererchat_openChat
metrics.description: When user opens CWSPR chat panel

metrics.name: codewhispererchat_enterFocusChat
metrics.description: When chat panel comes into focus

metrics.name: codewhispererchat_exitFocusChat
metrics.description: When chat panel goes out of focus

metrics.name: codewhispererchat_closeChat
metrics.description: When chat panel is closed

metrics.name: codewhispererchat_startConversation
metrics.description: When user starts a new conversation

metrics.name: codewhispererchat_addMessage
metrics.description: When a message is added to the conversation

metrics.name: codewhispererchat_messageResponseError
metrics.description: When an error has occured in response to a prompt

metrics.name: codewhispererchat_interactWithMessage
metrics.description: When a user interacts with a message in the conversation

metrics.name: codewhispererchat_modifyCode
metrics.description: % of code modified by the user after copying/inserting code from a message

metrics.name: codewhispererchat_enterFocusConversation
metrics.description: When a conversation comes into focus

metrics.name: codewhispererchat_exitFocusConversation
metrics.description: When a conversation goes out of focus

metrics.name: amazonq_startChat
metrics.description: Number of times the user have triggered /dev and started the chat

metrics.name: amazonq_approachInvoke
metrics.description: Emitted when the user started Approach process and captures if the proccess succeeded or failed.

metrics.name: amazonq_approachIteration
metrics.description: User recieved a result in Approach Iteration stage

metrics.name: amazonq_isApproachAccepted
metrics.description: User has accepted the approach generated by Weaverbird.

metrics.name: amazonq_codeGenerationInvoke
metrics.description: Emitted when the user started Code Generation process and captures if the proccess succeeded or failed.

metrics.name: amazonq_codeGenerationIteration
metrics.description: User recieved a result in Code Generation Iteration stage

metrics.name: amazonq_isAcceptedCodeChanges
metrics.description: User applied code changes generated for the task.

metrics.name: amazonq_isRejectedCodeChanges
metrics.description: User rejected code changes generated for the task.

metrics.name: amazonq_isReviewedChanges
metrics.description: User reviewed changes

metrics.name: amazonq_codeGenerationThumbsUp
metrics.description: User clicked on the thumbs up button to say that they are unsatisfied

metrics.name: amazonq_codeGenerationThumbsDown
metrics.description: User clicked on the thumbs down button to say that they are unsatisfied

metrics.name: amazonq_approachThumbsUp
metrics.description: User clicked on the thumbs up button, to mention that they are satisfied

metrics.name: amazonq_approachThumbsDown
metrics.description: User clicked on the thumbs down button to say that they are unsatisfied
